medical_facility.name: Amoxicilin+Sulbactam(SUMAKIN)
medical_facility.CSD: Drink 3 times a day, 2 packs each time(morning, noon, afternoon)

medical_facility.name: Salbutamol sulface,Bromhexin HCL(SALMODIL)
